Class FileChecksum

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileChecksum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writable

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Stable
public abstract class FileChecksum
extends Object
implements Writable
    An abstract class representing file checksums for files.
